Name: Elite Loot Key
Description:
In the wildness, the team that first deals DMG to an elite monster and defeat it gains the right to open the loot chest dropped by the elite monster. This item is required to open the chest. In addition to chests, elite monsters also drop EXP, season points, Luno, and have a chance to drop rare monster materials.
Refreshes daily from 05:00 - 05:10(UTC-2). Grants: 2
When the quantity held exceeds 6, no more will be granted automatically.
